subject: Re: [junit] Getting JUnit 4 from CVS
msgSnippet: quikdraw, There might be an issue with your setup, but I ve found SourceForge anonymous CVS to be unreliable in the past.  About once a week, it refuses to
messageBody:
quikdraw,

There might be an issue with your setup, but I've found SourceForge
anonymous CVS to be unreliable in the past. About once a week, it
refuses to respond for a couple hours. Have you tried again since? Good
luck,

David Saff

quikdraw2700 wrote:

> Howdy Folks,
>
> I'm trying to get JUnit 4 from SF using :
> pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/junit as described
> on http://sourceforge.net/cvs/?group_id=15278 without luck. I've tried a
> command line CVS client, the Eclipse
> 3.1 client and TortoiseCVS. I get varying errors depending on the client,
> but they seem to all be related to
> either the CVS server timing out or the connection being refused.
>
> Sorry for the noise on what should be a very simple question, but can
> anyone
> point out what I'm doing wrong?
> Is it possible the JUnit 4 branch was moved to another repository?
> --
> ----
> Thanks,
> quikdraw2700@...
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
>
>
>
